SELECT count(*) FROM log_log AS ll LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment AS eqi ON ll.equipment_int = eqi.equipment_int LEFT JOIN eqi_device AS dev ON ll.device_id = dev.device_id LEFT JOIN base_access_info AS bai ON eqi.acc_point_res_id = bai.acc_point_res_id LEFT JOIN base_process_info AS bpi ON bai.process_id = bpi.process_id LEFT JOIN base_factory_info AS bfi ON bpi.factory_id = bfi.factory_id LEFT JOIN base_matrix_info AS bmi ON bfi.matrix_id = bmi.matrix_id LEFT JOIN cap_user AS cur ON ll.`user` = cur.USER_ID
ll.log_type = '104'
and ll.log_status like '%${logStatus}%'
and eqi.equipment_id like '%${equipmentId}%'
and eqi.equipment_name like '%${equipmentName}%'
and bmi.matrix_name like '%${matrixName}%'
and bfi.factory_name like '%${factoryName}%'
and bpi.process_name like '%${processName}%'
and ll.operation_type like '%${operationType}%'
and eqi.equipment_continue_port like '%${equipmentContinuePort}%'
and cur.USER_NAME like '%${operateName}%'
and ll.equipment_exchange_time like '%${equipmentExchangeTime}%'

SELECT ll.log_status, eqi.equipment_id, eqi.equipment_name, dev.app_id, eqi.equipment_ip, eqi.equipment_continue_port, bmi.matrix_name, bfi.factory_name, bpi.process_name, ll.operation_type, operation_content, cur.USER_NAME AS operateName, ll.equipment_exchange_time FROM log_log AS ll LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment AS eqi ON ll.equipment_int = eqi.equipment_int LEFT JOIN eqi_device AS dev ON ll.device_id = dev.device_id LEFT JOIN base_access_info AS bai ON eqi.acc_point_res_id = bai.acc_point_res_id LEFT JOIN base_process_info AS bpi ON bai.process_id = bpi.process_id LEFT JOIN base_factory_info AS bfi ON bpi.factory_id = bfi.factory_id LEFT JOIN base_matrix_info AS bmi ON bfi.matrix_id = bmi.matrix_id LEFT JOIN cap_user AS cur ON ll.`user` = cur.USER_ID
ll.log_type = '104'
and ll.log_status like '%${logStatus}%'
and eqi.equipment_id like '%${equipmentId}%'
and eqi.equipment_name like '%${equipmentName}%'
and bmi.matrix_name like '%${matrixName}%'
and bfi.factory_name like '%${factoryName}%'
and bpi.process_name like '%${processName}%'

and eqi.equipment_continue_port like '%${equipmentContinuePort}%'
and cur.USER_NAME like '%${operateName}%'
and ll.equipment_exchange_time like '%${equipmentExchangeTime}%'

limit ${begin},${limit}
mapper.insert: insert into log_log (log_id, log_type, log_status, equipment_int, device_id, operation_type, operation_content, user, equipment_exchange_time, create_time) values (#{logId}, #{logType}, #{logStatus}, #{equipmentInt}, #{deviceId}, #{operationType}, #{operationContent}, #{user}, #{equipmentExchangeTime}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT ll.log_status, eqi.equipment_id, eqi.equipment_name, dev.app_id, eqi.equipment_ip, eqi.equipment_continue_port, bmi.matrix_name, bfi.factory_name, bpi.process_name, ll.operation_type, operation_content, cur.USER_NAME AS operateName, ll.equipment_exchange_time FROM log_log AS ll LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment AS eqi ON ll.equipment_int = eqi.equipment_int LEFT JOIN eqi_device AS dev ON ll.device_id = dev.device_id LEFT JOIN base_access_info AS bai ON eqi.acc_point_res_id = bai.acc_point_res_id LEFT JOIN base_process_info AS bpi ON bai.process_id = bpi.process_id LEFT JOIN base_factory_info AS bfi ON bpi.factory_id = bfi.factory_id LEFT JOIN base_matrix_info AS bmi ON bfi.matrix_id = bmi.matrix_id LEFT JOIN cap_user AS cur ON ll.`user` = cur.USER_ID where ll.log_type = '104' and dev.app_id = #{APPId} ORDER BY ll.equipment_exchange_time DESC
